name: Butterfree
author: Tika Matsuno
flavor_text: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.effect: Switch out your opponent’s Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Bye-Bye Flight
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. Shuffle that Pokémon and all attached cards into their deck, and then shuffle this Pokémon and all attached cards into your deck. If your opponent has no Benched Pokémon, this attack does nothing.
